translations: 汽船，大轮船；汽锅，蒸锅；<非正式>湿式潜水服；结帮抢劫者，团伙抢劫者；<美> 沙海螂；蒸汽熨斗

sentences.translation: 你们的轮船什么时候启航？

sentences.sentence: The steamer Swadeshi had fouled the Howrah bridge and sunk.
sentences.translation: “斯瓦德希”号轮船撞在豪拉桥上沉没了。

sentences.sentence: Under the stress of competition, steamer was added to steamer, loss piled on loss, while the income dwindled till it ceased to be worth while to print tickets.
sentences.translation: 在竞争的压力下，轮船一艘艘增加，亏损越来越大，而收入却逐渐减少，最后连印船票都不值得了。
